data.additional_notes:
#### SDHQ's Build Score Breakdown


Steelrising is an enjoyable souls-like when it works. Unfortunately, be prepared for unstable framerates, it is definitely not optimized well.
- **Performance:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Visuals:** ★★☆☆☆ (2/5)
- **Stability:** ★★☆☆☆ (2/5)
- **Controls:** ★★★★☆ (4/5)
- **Battery:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
